reviewText:
Brief overview of the tactical pistol.  Starts off with an explanation of the Modern Technique of the Pistol; weaver stance, presentation, flash sight picture, compressed suprise break and the heavy duty pistol.  Other topics include; reloading, failure drills, malfunction clearances, barricades and corners and low light considerations.

Jack Furr and Bill Jeans are the instructors.  There are 38 minutes of instruction followed by a dry fire session for a total of 48 minutes.
